import tensorflow as tf  

...   
run_config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(train_distribute=dist, **CONF.runconfig).replace(
        session_config=tf.ConfigProto(device_count={'GPU': 1, 'CPU': 1},
                                      session_inter_op_thread_pool=**tf.ThreadPoolOptionProto(num_threads=xx)**
                                      inter_op_parallelism_threads=8,
                                      intra_op_parallelism_threads=8,
                                      allow_soft_placement=True))
...

while, an ERROR throw:
model 'tensorflow' has no attrbute 'ThreadPoolOptionProto'.
